texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento CUMBRE DE LAS AMERICAS, está compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y un  varón,  todas ellas se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Alejandra, tiene 36 años tiene dos hijos de las edades de 6 y 4 años, ella se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir,   vive en la localidad de El Torno donde es su taller, este préstamo este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución va a usar este préstamo para la compra de una maquina over   su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que tienen  pedidos de sus clientes que tiene que entregar, la señora Alejandra enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la falta de capital,  y va a utilizar los beneficios en el crecimiento del negocio su deseo  para  su negocio es tener mayores ingresos y apoyar a la familia económicamente y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: The "CUMBRE DE LAS AMERICAS" communal bank is composed of eight members, six females and two men. All of them have different businesses. The President of the group is Alejandra. She is 36 years old, and has two children, aged 4 and 6 years old. Her business is sewing clothing. She lives in El Torno which is where she has her shop. This loan is her second from this institution. She will use the loan to buy a serger. She has orders from her customers that she has to fill. Her challenge in her business is the lack of capital. She will use the profits in increasing her business. Her desire for her business is to have greater revenues and support her family, providing them with a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad has a store where he sells small household appliances like electric teapots, irons, blenders, etc. He is 44 years old, married, and has two children. His wife is a housewife. The elder of his children is going to the eleventh class of secondary school in preparation for the university. His other child is also school-aged and is going to the ninth class. They are living in the Baki region. 

It’s noted that Rashad has a market and today he wants to increase his business, so he wants to buy more electrical goods for selling. For this reason he needs a loan in amount of 1,200 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). Rashad says that he is greatly thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for help.

loans.use: to buy more electrical goods for selling

loans.name: Picaflor Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PICAFLOR” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Virginia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de ropa, venta de charque, venta de pollo broster.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Virginia es integrante, ella indica que es el primer ciclo que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarla a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pollos a la broster; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por iniciativa propia al observar que por su domicilio es una parada de buses y los transeúntes constantemente requieren alimento.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa y pollos por mayor) que adquirirá en la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las compañeras de su grupo son cumplidas.
texts.en:
The “PICAFLOR” communal bank is starting their first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Patacamaya branch office. It is made up of 8 members lead by a board of directors with Virginia as the President. The businesses of the members are varied, amongst them are: a neighborhood store, clothing sales, the sale of charque (salty meat jerky) and the sale of broasted chicken.

The loan will benefit all these entrepreneurs including Virginia. She says that this is her first cycle with Pro Mujer and she joined on the invitation of a promoter of the institution who visited her at her home. She has a business selling broasted chickens. She learned the business on her own initiative watching the parade of buses and constant train of passerbys who needed food. The loan she is requesting is to increase her capital (buying potatoes and chicken wholesale) which she will acquire in the city of La Paz and then sell in her commercial space. This form of working allows her to generate resources to support her family as she is in a common-law relationship and has 4 children. When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer she liked that her fellow members are very talented.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and chicken wholesale.

loans.name: Mariscal De Vilaque Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARISCAL DE VILAQUE” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Benigna es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: librería, tienda de barrio, venta de comida, venta de carne, tejido de mantas, venta de abarrotes, jardinero.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Benigna es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de abarrotes; da a conocer que este negocio fue un negocio familiar que posteriormente paso a potestad de ella, en la actualidad trabaja diariamente con el negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de abarrotes por mayor) que adquirirá de las tiendas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le el crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “MARISCAL DE VILAQUE” communal bank will begin its second cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of the Copacabana center. It is made up of eight members and led by a board of directors, of which Benigna is the president. The businesses the members have are varied. Among them are a book store, selling food, selling meat, weaving blankets, selling groceries, and gardening. 
 
The loan they will take out will benefit the micro-business women, including Benigna. She says that she joined Pro Mujer a year ago at the invitation of a consultant from the institution who went to visit her at her house. Right now, she has a business selling groceries. She says that this was a family business that was passed on to her. She works at the business daily. 
 
The loan she will take out now is to increase capital by buying groceries wholesale. She will acquire them from stores in the city of El Alto and later she will sell them in her sales space. This work allows her to generate resources to support her family, since she is in a common law marriage and has two children.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the loans offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy groceries wholesale.

loans.name: Lamula

texts.en:
Lamula is married with four children, two of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

Lamula has a business selling roasted green bananas and has been in this business for eight years. She doesn’t have any other income-generating activity. She works at the market seven days a week and sells on a retail basis. 

Lamula has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bunches of green bananas. Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. She aspires to invest in used clothes and also wants to buy a plot of land and build a house. She decided to join MCDT SACCO because of timely loans.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is a 42-year-old businessman in Thika. He is married to Caroline and together they are blessed with two children, aged 9 and 3. Michael operates a motorcycle transport business. He has operated this business for the past three years. He earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES, which he uses to support himself and his family. 

This marks his first loan term with VisionFund Kenya after he was recently introduced by VisionFund staff. With this loan he will be able to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle. The additional income created will allow him buy enough food for his family and pay school fees for his children. In the future, Michael would like to expand his motorcycle business further. 

He hopes to buy a public service vehicle and become an established businessman.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 35-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as creative. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals and milk. She also keeps livestock. She has been involved in this business for four years. 

Mary will use the 14,500 KES loan to buy a solar lamp for lighting their house.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 24 years old from Nyahururu. She is married to John and they are blessed with three children aged 8, 6 and 3 years.

She has been running her business of selling clothes for the last one year. To enable her to buy more stocks of clothes to sell to her customers, she has applied for her first loan of KES 30,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

Her monthly income right now is KES 20,000 and she has plans of using the anticipated profits from her expanded business to educate her children, buy more stocks and to pay her loan back to VisionFund Kenya. In the future, she hopes to be a successful business lady.

loans.use: To buy more stocks of clothes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Stellah

texts.en:
Stellah is a 30-year-old married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as innovative. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. She also keeps livestock. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are commercial. 

Stellah will use the 7,900 KES loan to buy a solar lamp for lighting her house. Her business goal is to expand her business within five years.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Aquinata

texts.en:
Aquinata is a 28-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as innovative. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals and other foodstuff. She also keeps livestock. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in an area with potential. 

Aquinata will use the 7,900 KES loan to buy a solar lamp for lighting their house.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Nusrat is a 42-year-old married woman. For about 10 years she has been working at hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins, and stones for embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers.  She is in her fourth loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins, and stones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers and clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and increase his merchandise

loans.name: Yaquira Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Yaquira Maria, estudiante de Auxiliar De Enfermería, está en primer semestre, tiene como propósito adquirir conocimiento, prepararse y adquirir habilidad para un mejor desarrollo personal y social y de esta manera poder brindar a satisfacción servicios a la comunidad.

El  propósito esencial  es ayudar, guiar, brindar a las personas de escasos recursos al mismo tiempo de los que tienen las posibilidades, como niños, ancianos, jóvenes una mejor atención con los conocimientos, experiencias, en cuanto a salud y servicio concierne hasta satisfacer  necesidades de los mismos, por tales motivos eligió estudiar enfermería. 
Ella necesita del convenio con kiva, ya que le comentaron que es una ayuda que ella puede tener al realizar el pago mensual de las cuotas, con kiva le quedaría un valor a pagar un poco más económico y se puede economizar una parte de dinero para poder invertir en otros gastos que ella tiene con el estudio.
texts.en:
This is Yaquira Maria. She is an assistant nursing student. Her goal is to acquire knowledge, become educated and acquire skills for better personal and social development. This way she can offer satisfactory services to the community. 

The  main goal is to help, to guide, and to offer people of low income as well as those with more opportunities, such as children, the elderly, and youth. She can give them good attention with her knowledge and experience about health care and service to meet their needs. That is why she decided to study nursing. 

She needs the Kiva loan because she was told that she can make the monthly payment. With Kiva her payments are a little lower and she can budget a part of the money to invest in other expenses that she has for her education.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Blanca Lucia

texts.es:
Blanca nació en Latacunga, perteneciente a la parroquia Pastocalle del cantón Latacunga perteneciente a la provincia de Cotopaxi de la República del Ecuador tiene 30 años de edad, está casada con Marco  de 28 años, tienen dos, los mismos que son menores de edad, Ronny tiene 7 añitos y Tania que tiene 3 añitos, actualmente viven en casa de unos familiares en Pastocalle este sector es muy reconocido porque su gente se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura. Blanca ha demostrado ser una mujer luchadora y emprendedora,  con el esfuerzo y sacrifico de sus padres pudo terminar la secundaria, ya que desde que terminó el colegio tuvo que trabajar.
Blanca tuvo muchos obstáculos en su vida y en su matrimonio pero  con la ayuda de sus hijos y de sus padres salieron adelante.
Por la falta de recursos económico en un inicio Blanca tuvo que buscar la manera de solventar y ayudar a su esposo en los gastos, y empezó a criar animales, esto era ya una gran ayuda para su familia, después Blanca descubrió un don y decido ponerse un gabinete de belleza, en donde también vende productos de belleza y ropa por catálogo. Por el momento solicita un crédito para invertir en el mejoramiento de su vivienda y comprar más productos, debido a que su negocio ha sido por aceptado y acogido por la gente que vive cerca y cada día los pedidos son más grandes.
Hoy Blanca  quiere extender un sincero agradecimiento y felicitación a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Blanca was born in Latacunga, which belongs to Pastocalle Parish, Latacunga Canton, Cotopaxi Province in the Republic of Ecuador. She is 30 years old and is married to Marco, who is 28. She has two children, Ronny who is 7 and Tania who is 3 years old. They live in the house of family members in Pastocalle. This area is famous for farming and raising livestock.

Blanca has proved herself to be a fighter and an entrepreneur. With the sacrifice and effort of her parents she was able to complete her Secondary school and once she had done this she had to work. Blanca has had a lot of obstacles in her life and in her marriage but with the help of her children and her parents she has manged to get ahead.

For the lack of money at the beginning of her marriage she had to find a way to help her husband with the expenses and she started to raise small animals. This was a big help for her family and she discovered a talent. Then she decided to start a beauty salon where she sells beauty products and clothing by catalog.

Blanca is requesting a loan to invest in the improvement of her house and to buy more product as her business has been accepted and embraced by the people who live around her. Her orders are continually growing. Today Blanca wants to extend a sincere thank you and congratulations to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva to making this growth in her personal and business life possible.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and make improvements on her house.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is a 38-year-old single mother; she is blessed with three children. She sells groceries in Kiambu and has been in this business for eight years now. Miriam earns a monthly income of 15,000 shillings.

This will be Miriam's first loan with VisionFund Kenya. She plans to use the entire amount to buy different types of groceries, like tomatoes, fruits and vegetables, for her business. In the future she hopes to be a successful businesslady in order to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for selling

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stock of clothes and bedding

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a 28-year-old married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a farm where she grows crops. 

Gladys describes her family's challenge to be lack of water. She will use the 32,700 KES loan to buy a 5,000-litre water tank. This will enable her family to store clean water for domestic use. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a 5,000-litre water tank

loans.name: Mahinder

texts.en: Mahinder is very thankful to all Kiva lenders for helping him realize his dream. He has fully repaid his previous loan. Now he needs another loan for the next season, since rice cultivation requires high-cost inputs like fertilizer, pesticides, seeds and diesel. With this loan of 12,000 SRD he can expand his production and save for the weddings of his children.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and other inputs for cultivation.

loans.name: Soedesh

texts.en: Soedesh thanks all Kiva Lenders for helping him realize his long-terms goals. He repaid his previous loan to Kiva lenders on time. He approaches Seva MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of 7,000 SRD to purchase fertilizers and pesticides and continue production. With the profits from this loan, he can expand his rice-growing areas and save some money for his future and his children's education.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his rice cultivation

loans.name: Carmen Amelia

texts.es:
Carmen Amelia vive en el Recinto San Ramón, perteneciente al cantón de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, un pueblo muy turístico por los múltiples ríos y las bellezas de paisaje que se ven, además es  una zona productiva en ganadería.
Carmen Amelia es una señora que quedó viuda hace 4 años, vive con un hijo que le ayuda en el mantenimiento de los potreros ya que ella cuenta con finca ganadera, donde tiene unas cuantas vaquitas. Carmen dedica tiempo todos los días a sus animalitos, los lleva al pasto y ordeña por la mañana, cuenta con experiencia en la entrega de leche hace más de 40 años.
Carmen es una señora muy trabajadora, ha sacado adelante a sus hijos gracias a la producción de leche. Ahora Carmen tiene la necesidad de adquirir un crédito ya que la ganancia de la leche no es gran magnitud, necesita un crédito para la compra de una vaca lechera de oportunidad que le están vendiendo, además para aprovechar unas chancheras que tiene y comprar chanchitos y así poder incrementar sus ganancias.
Carmen visitó a  Fundación Alternativa, se siente muy feliz por la ayuda brindada, agradecida también con el proyecto Kiva ya que gracias a ellos puede hacer realidad de recomenzar con el negocio de chanchos.
texts.en:
Carmen Amelia lives in Recinto San Ramón, in the canton of Santo Domingo de los Colorados. It's a tourist town with many rivers and beautiful scenery. It is also an area with a lot of cattle ranches.

Carmen Amelia became a widow four years ago. She lives with her son, who helps her maintain the pastures. She has a cattle estate with many cattle. Carmen dedicates time every day to her animals. She lets them graze and milks them in the morning. She has over 40 years of milking experience.

Carmen is a very hard-working woman. She has moved her children forward thanks to milk production. Now, Carmen needs some credit because her earnings from milk aren't that much. She needs a loan to buy a milking cow now that they are being sold. She also wants to take advantage of some pigs she has and to buy some piglets to increase her income.

Carmen visited Fundación Alternativa. She is very happy for the help they are providing. She is also thankful for the Kiva project because, thanks to them, she can make restarting her business a reality.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow.

loans.name: Askar

texts.ru:
Аскар добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 37 лет. Он женат и имеет детей. Всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою работу. Аскар живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Аскар занимается деканством и животноводством.

У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Аскар занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Аскар хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Аскар заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Askar is a good-natured and cheerful man of 37.  He is married and has children, and puts his whole soul into his work.  Askar lives with his wife in a small home in a rural village, and runs his business in order to feed his family.  He works in animal husbandry and has a plot of land, part of which is fed by rain water, and part of which is irrigated.  On this plot of land Askar grows carrots, potatoes, and grain, and his wife helps him care for and raise cattle. Because they have a large plot of land, they also have the cattle graze on their land.  Animal husbandry provides a good income, and thus Askar wants to expand his business and increase the number of cattle in his herd.  For this reason he turned to Arvand to receive a loan to purchase cattle.  Askar thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: El señor Orlando tiene 31 años es soltero y no tiene hijos dependientes, vive solo en alquiler en la zona de Quillacollo, hace 6 años que no vive con sus padres quienes son de condiciones muy humildes y no tenían recursos económicos para pagarle la universidad ya que tiene muchos hermanos menores que se encuentran estudiando en el colegio es  por esto que decidió independizarse y trabajar por su cuenta, se vino a una zona más céntrica, trabajo en diferentes actividades, ahorro y posteriormente empezó a comprar conejos de raza para la comercialización de los mismos. Esta actividad le fue bastante rentable ya que le permitió estudiar y terminar la carrera de veterinaria, actualmente se encuentra haciendo su trabajo dirigido para defender su tesis. El crédito solicitado es para la compra de una vaca para el incremento de producción de leche, en esta última gestión decidió hacer esta compra para incrementar sus ingresos y pagar los trámites de su carrera.
texts.en: Orlando is 31 years old, single, with no children.  He lives alone in a rented apartment in the zone of Quillacollo.  It has been six years since he no longer lives with his parents, who are from a very humble background and did not have the economic means to pay for his university given that he has many smaller siblings that are studying in high school.  For this reason, he decided to become more independent and work on his own.  He moved to a more central neighborhood, worked in different fields, saved and recently he began to buy rabbit breeds for sale.  This work was considerably profitable for him as it allowed him to study and finish his veterinary studies.  Currently he is doing his work aimed at defending his thesis.  The loan requested is so that he can purchase a cow for the increased milk production.  He decided to make this purchase to increase his income and to pay for the steps of his career.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Union Paltaybamba Group

texts.es:
La socia Justina pertenece al banco UNION PALTAYBAMBA, el banco se encuentra ubicado en el sector de Paltaybamba, distrito de Yanatile, provincia Calca.

La socia Justina tiene 45 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz y leche para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.

Los demás socios se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales menores, tienda de abarrotes, venta de cereales.
texts.en:
Member Justina belongs to the bank UNION PALTAYBAMBA.  The bank is located in the sector of Paltaybamba, district of Yanatile, in the province of Calca.  
Justina is 45 years old, married, and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with the grocery business, selling different kinds of products like rice, sugar, milk, candy, sodas among other things. Justina has had her business for awhile, which has been going well thanks to the commitment she gives each day to her work.  She hopes to be able to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family.  

She is requesting the credit for the purchase of rice and milk for her business.  She is grateful for the loan given to her and is dedicated to complying with all her quotes established. The other members work in agriculture, the raising of small livestock, a grocery store, and the sale of grains.

loans.use: to purchase rice and milk for their business.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: El joven Eduardo tiene 27 años y es Soltero,  estudia la carrera  de licenciatura en Psicología en una de las universidades reconocidas  de  la Ciudad de La Paz,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios El joven José tiene una tienda de barrio donde ofrece variedad de productos de primera necesidad, es de ahí que tiene un ingreso extra,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y  el joven Eduardo va a usar este préstamo para  la compra de computadora ya que esto le ayudara a realizar sus trabajos finales,  Eduardo enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse completamente a sus  estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere ejercer su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia y con el tiempo poder tener una especialidad en su área.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 27 years old and single. He is studying Psychology in one of the universities in the city of La Paz. Eduardo works in order to pay for his studies.  He owns a neighborhood store, in which he offers a variety of basic household items. It is from this business that he earns extra money. 

This is Eduardo's first loan with this micro-finance institution.  He will use this first loan to buy a computer that will help him to finish his final assignments.  Eduardo faces some challenges in his studies such as that his work does not allow him to dedicate himself entirely to his education. However, Eduardo hopes to keep moving forward. When he finishes his degree he hopes to practice psychology, improve his quality of life as well as that of his family. Eventually he hopes to have a specialty in his field.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она год как занимается двумя деятельностьями, а именно растениеводством и животноводством. Нилуфар 27 лет, она живет в районе Яван с мужем, трехлетним сыном, матерью, двумя младшими сестрами и братом. Муж мастер по стройке и ремонту домов. А мать и сестры являются членами дехканского хозяйства. Сама Нилуфар при дворе дома разводит крупнорогатый скот и выращивает огородные культуры. Она сейчас нуждается в кредите для продолжения деятельностей. За счет кредита Нилуфар хочет приобрести пару голов крупнорогатого скота и частично семена и минеральные удобрения. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Nilufar is a very hardworking woman.  For one year she has been running two businesses - growing crops and raising livestock.  Nilufar is 27 years old, and lives in Yavan with her husband, three sons, mother, two younger sisters, and brother.  Her husband works in construction and home repair, while her mother and sisters work on a group farm.  Nilufar raises cattle and grows vegetables near her home.  She needs a loan in order to keep running her businesses.  With the money from the loan, Nilufar hopes to buy two head of cattle, seeds, and fertilizer.  She is in need of your support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle, seeds, and fertilizer

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru:
Абдурахмон трудолюбивый и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 63 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Все его дети уже взрослые и сами имеют свои семьи. Абдурахмон живёт со своей женой в небольшом посёлке, у них есть маленький домик. Абдурахмон полон сил и энергии, несмотря на свой возраст. Он никогда не жаловался на своё здоровье, так как всегда находится в движении и занимается физической работой.

Абдурахмон работает водителем грузовой машины. Он занимается перевозкой людей, а также малого груза. Вот уже как 20 лет он занимается этой работой. Дети Абдурахмона также занимаются своим бизнесом, и тем самым помогают своим родителям. Один из сыновей Абдурахмона имеет свою небольшую аптеку. Сейчас Абдурахмон хочет произвести капитальный ремонта своей машины, чтобы обновить для дальнейшей работы. У него не хватает денежных средств для закупа необходимых запчастей. Поэтому Абдурахмон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку запчастей для своей машины. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Abdurahmon is a hardworking and cheerful man of 63.  He is married and has four children.  All of his children are grown and have their own families.  Abdurahmon lives with his wife in a small village, and they have a small home.  Abdurahomn is full of strength and energy, no matter what his age.  He never complains about his health because he is always active and engaged in physical work.  Abdurahmon works as a truck driver, and transports people as well as small cargo.  He has been working in this job for 20 years.  Abdurahmon's children also have their own businesses, and help out their parents.  One of Abdurahmon's sons has a small pharmacy.  Abdurahomn hopes to redo his truck so that he will be able to continue working.  He doesn't have enough money, however, to purchase the necessary parts.  For this reason, Abdurahmon turned to Arvand, and hopes to receive a loan to buy parts for his truck.  He thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy car parts

loans.name: Burma

texts.ru: Бурма,47 лет, замужем, есть взрослая и самостоятельная дочь. У Бурмы- среднее образование, она знает как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. Бурма в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1994 году с покупки скота на 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бурмы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы и выращивает картофель и морковь на 0,70 ГА земли. Также Бурма на дому оказывает швейные услуги. Совокупный ежемесячный доход составляет свыше 10,000 сомов (KGS). Для содержания скота имеются все условия, сено и корма заготовлены в достаточном количестве. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бурма обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сомов (KGS)-на покупку семян картофеля элитных сортов и минеральных удобрений, что позволит повысить урожайность, улучшить плодородность почвы и расширить швейный бизнес. Доходы от кредита Бурма планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и хочет накопить средства на строительство дома для дочери.
texts.en: Burma is 47 years old, married, and has a grown, independent daughter.  Burma has a secondary education - she knows how to plan and use money for the purpose of achieving goals.  Burma's work in animal husbandry, beginning in 1994 with the purchase of cattle for 3,000 KGS, serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Thanks to Burma's hard work, she now has 2 milk cows and grows potatoes and carrots on 0.70 hectares of land, while also running a sewing business out of her home.  Her total monthly income is more than 10,000 KGS.  She has all of the necessities, including a sufficient amount of hay and feed saved up, for taking care of cattle.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Burma turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase top of the line potato seeds and fertilizer, which will help her increase productivity and the fertility of her soil, and which will also help her expand her sewing business.  With the money earned from her loan, Burma plans to save toward further increasing the size of her herd, and hopes to save towards building a house for her daughter.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds

loans.name: Bacilia

texts.es: La señora Basilia, tiene 42 años   ella se dedica a vender en un mercado cerca de su casa vende por las mañanas empanadas de queso,   este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  La señora Basilia va a usar este préstamo de  para la compra de material de construcción para hacer construir su casita, La señora Basilia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la falta de capital ya que ella se encuentra en mercado que va creciendo. Va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su negocio, su deseo para su negocio es  ampliar la venta de comida  ya que está incrementando su clientela y este sería un ingreso extra más y así poder terminar la construcción de su casita ya que se necesita mucho dinero para esto y poder tener más ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Bacilia is 42 years old. She makes a living selling cheese empanadas in a market nearby her home each morning. This loan is her first with this institution. Bacilia is going to use this loan to buy building materials for the construction of her house. A challenge Bacilia faces is a lack of capital even though she finds herself in a growing market. She will use this loan to keep improving her business. She hopes to expand her food sales as her customer base grows. This will be an extra income that will help her to finish building her house, which she really needs extra money to do, as well as to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Hadisamo

texts.ru: Хадисамо жительница не большого района Вахш по близости городка Курган-Тюбе. Ей 54 года. Она мама троих детей. У нее 2 сына и дочка. Сыновьям 23 и 20 лет. Дочери 15 лет. Дети Хадисамо занимаются земледелием, на определенном участке земли выращивают сельскохозяйственные культуры. Сама Хадисамо около 4 лет выращивает крупнорогатых скотов в коровнике. Ей нравится работать в этой сфере деятельности, и она хотела бы расширить малый бизнес и добиться успехов в этом направлении. Хадисамо планирует получить кредит и приобрести телят для откорма и продажи.
texts.en: Hadisamo is a resident of the small region of Vakhsh, which is near the town of Kurgan-Tube.  She is 54 years old, and is the mother of three children, two sons and a daughter.  Her sons are 23 and 20, and her daughter is 15.  Hadisamo's children work in farming, particularly in raising crops.  Hadisamo has been raising cattle for 4 years in a barn.  She likes working in this field, and would like to expand her small business and achieve success in this work.  Hadisamo plans to receive a loan and buy calves to fatten and sell.

loans.use: to purchase calves to expand her cattle business

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
la socia Julia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de tamales,biscochuelos y maicillos que son como pasteles hechos a base de maiz,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria en una plaza desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local mas amplio para vender sus biscochos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos como harina,azucar,manteca y huevos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julia continues dedicating her time to her business selling tamales, spongecakes and sorghum, which are like cakes made from corn. Julia sells her food as a street vendor in the plaza from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. She has been in this business for several years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her food products. 

Julia is requesting this loan in order to buy groceries such as flour, sugar, butter, and eggs. She is happy to have this loan and she pledges to make all of her repayments.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as flour, sugar, butter, and eggs.

loans.name: Nasibahon

texts.ru: Насибахон 47 лет, разведена, мать 4 детей. У Насибахон - среднее образование. По характеру Насибахон очень ответственная, общительная, жизнерадостная. На протяжении 14 лет она занимается полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Насибахон, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 0,24 ГА собственной и 0,35 ГА арендованной земельной доли. В основном выращивает картофель, кукурузу, хлопок и овощи. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Насибахон обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS)- на покупку семян огурцов и помидор, также часть средств будет потрачена на приобретение минеральных удобрений. Доходы от кредита Насибахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Nasibahon is 47, divorced, and the mother of 4 children.  Nasibahon has a secondary education and is responsible, sociable, and cheerful.  She has been working in agriculture for 14 years and, thanks to her hard work, now has 0.24 hectares of her own land, and 0.35 hectares of land that she rents.  She primarily raises potatoes, corn, cotton, and vegetables.  Her monthly income is about 20,000 KGS.  With the goal of further increasing her business, Nasibahon turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 45,000 KGS to purchase cucumber and tomato seeds.  Part of the loan will also be used to buy fertilizer.  With the income earned from the loan, Nasibahon plans to save toward further expanding her business, and also hopes to save toward home repairs.

loans.use: To buy cucumber and tomato seeds

loans.name: Nasuri

texts.en:
Nasuri runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits. Nasuri lives in Cilegon, a semi-urban area about 2,5 hours from Jakarta. Nasuri is single and living with six people in the family home. 

Nasuri began working with Ruma 9 months ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru:
Дилором 28 лет. Она предприимчивая молодая женщина, проживающая в городе Куляб с мужем, двумя маленькими сыновьями, свекровью и свёкорю. Уже несколько месяцев как муж Дилором находится в России на заработках. Он был вынужден покинуть семью и уехать в чужую страну ради их обеспечения. 
Дилором тоже трудится во благо семьи. Она у себя дома принимает заказы на шитье женских платьев национального стиля. Она научилась этому ремеслу самостоятельно. Дилором уже 5 лет как шьет на старой ручной машинке. Теперь она хочет расширить деятельность и просит кредит, чтобы купить новую швейную машинку. Поддержите Дилором в развитии ее швейного дела.
texts.en: Dilorom is 28.  She is an enterprising young lady who lives in the city of Kulyab with her husband, two small sons, and her mother- & father-in-law.  Her husband's been away for a few months as a migrant worker in Russia; he had to leave his family behind and go there to be able to provide for them.  Dilorom also works to support her family.  She works from home as a self-taught seamstress who makes Tajikistani dresses for women.  She's been at it for 5 years, and has used an old, manually-operated sewing machine the whole time.   Currently, she's hoping to expand her business and is seeking a loan to buy a new sewing machine.  Help Dilorom grow her dressmaking business.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine to help grow her business

loans.name: Vince

texts.en:
Vince runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits. Vince lives in Cilegon, a semi-urban area about 2.5 hours from Jakarta. Vince is married and living with five people in the family home. 

Vince began working with Ruma three and a half years ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Rohadi

texts.en:
Rohadi runs a small stall selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credits. Rohadi lives in Cilegon, a semi-urban area about 2.5 hours from Jakarta. Rohadi is married and living with three people in the family home. 

Rohadi began working with Ruma three years ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Hesti

texts.en:
Hesti runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits. Hesti lives in Cilegon, a semi-urban area about 2.5 hours from Jakarta. Hesti is married and living with five people in the family home. 

Hesti began working with Ruma six months ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Anees

texts.en: Anees is a 50-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all the household expenses, so she initiated her business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raises them and then sells them at the market at a higher price. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently, she has requested a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase more animals. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her. She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.to sell

loans.name: Rajindra

texts.en:
Rajindra thanks all Kiva Lenders for helping him to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time and was able to save some money for the future.

He is now approaching Seva MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of 10,000 Surinamese dollars (SRD) to purchase more fertilizers and pesticides and continue production.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Soeradj

texts.en:
Soeradj thanks all Kiva Lenders for helping him with his rice cultivation. He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time. He could save some money for his children's education and could expand his rice areas with the profits of this loan.

He approaches Seva MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of SRD 13,000 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his rice production.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his rice production.

loans.name: 3 De Mayo Group

texts.es: Banco de emprendimiento 3 DE MAYO Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes todas mujeres, la presidenta del banco es la Señora  Sobeida tiene 39 años tiene tres hijos de las edades de   hijos de las edades de 10, 6 y 4 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de combustible en su tienda donde también vende repuestos para autos frenos e inflado de llantas, tiene su tienda en la localidad de El Torno,  el destino del crédito es para la compra de gasolina para surtir su tienda, la señora Sobeida es una persona muy trabajadora lleva años en esta actividad está muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella ya que esta es la única actividad con la que mantiene a su familia.
texts.en: The 3 DE MAYO communal bank is composed of eight members, all of which are female. The president of the bank is Sobeida, who is 39 years old and has three children ages 10, 6 and 4. Her occupation is selling fuel at her store, where she also sells replacement auto parts, breaks and tire inflation. Her store is in the town of El Torno. The purpose of the loan is to buy gasoline to stock her store. Sobeida is a very hardworking person and has had this occupation for years. She is very thankful with Kiva for the support it has provided her, as this is the only activity with which she supports her family.

loans.use: to buy gasoline.

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.es:
La socia Cornelia se dedica al negocio de venta de maiz,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un locla donde pueda vender el maiz.La socia solicita el credito para comprar maiz.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Cornelia's occupation is the sale of corn. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has been in this business for 5 years and does very well. Her dream is to have a store where she could sell the corn. She is requesting this loan to buy corn. 

She is very happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Margarita continues working in her business selling clothes. She sells pants, blouses, and polos. She has been working in this business for years and it has gone very well for her. Margarita's dream is to have a bazaar. She is requesting this loan in order to buy shoes, polos, sweaters, and blouses. 

Margarita is happy for this loan and she pledges to make all of her repayments.

loans.use: to buy shoes, polos, sweaters, and blouses.

loans.name: Natuyuk

texts.en: Natuyuk is a 42-year-old married woman with 5 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a farm where she grows crops. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the lack of water. She will use the KES 32,700 loan to buy a 5,000 liter water tank.This will enable her family to harvest and store clean water for domestic use. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a 5,000 liter water tank.

loans.name: Taburjon

texts.ru:
Табурджон позитивный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 44 лет. Он был женат, но к сожаления его жена умерла.  Табурджон имеет  троих детей. И ему пришлось самому воспитывать своих детей. Поэтому Табурджон привык много работать, чтобы зарабатывать на проживание, а также удовлетворять все потребности своих детей. Он желает воспитать их хорошими и достойными людьми. 

Табурджон начал сотрудничать с Арванд  совсем недавно. Сам он работает мастером по ремонту домов. От этой работы он получает небольшую зарплату. Поэтому он решил начать ещё своё дело, которое будет приносить ему хороший доход. Сейчас он собирается купить сварочный аппарат и использовать его для получения прибыли. Этот аппарат имеет большой спрос, особенно в сельской местности, где необходимо постоянно что-то строить. Поэтому Табурджон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку сварочного аппарата. Он верит, что с помощью Арванд и Кива он сможет улучшить экономическое положение своей семьи. Табурджон заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Taburjon is a positive and responsible man of 44.  He was married, but unfortunately his wife passed away.  Taburjon has three children, and now is now raising them by himself.  Taburjon is used to working a lot to make a living and to meet the needs of his children.  He hopes to raise them to be good and worthy people.  Taburjon started working with Arvand only recently.  He works repairing houses, but only earns a small salary.  For this reason he decided to start his own business, which will provide him with a good income.  He is planning to buy a welding machine and to use it to make a profit.  This machine is in high demand, especially in a village, where things are constantly in need of being built.  Taburjon thus turned to Arvand and hopes to receive a loan to buy a welding machine.  He believes that, with the help of Arvard and Kiva, he can improve the financial situation of his family.  Taburjon thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine

loans.name: Carlos Agustin

texts.es:
El señor Carlos un hombre de 27 años mantiene una relación en unión libre de la cual tienen 3 hijos la mayor de 6 años y la ultima de 1 año 7 meses ellos viven y tienen su negocio en el Recinto san Bernabé en Los Bancos, un lugar de clima cálido lleno de gente amable y trabajadora los turistas nacionales y extranjeros siempre están visitando este Cantón a disfrutar de su flora y fauna silvestre. Carlos y la esposa vienen de una familia de bajos recurso económicos lo que les impidió prepararse, ellos solo tienen la primaria, hoy en día luchan muy duro para que sus hijos tengan lo que ellos no pudieron. 
Él se dedica a la agricultura a la producción de cerdos y trabajos en el campo, aprendió de esta actividad desde su niñez junto con los papás ya que fue criado en una finca del sector, a estas actividades le dedican un promedio de 10 horas al día, durante este tiempo la esposa de Carlos es quien le ayuda en el negocio 
Solicitan este crédito para la ampliación he incremento de las chancheras, con esta nueva inversión esperan mejorar sus ingresos económicos y darles un buen futuro a sus hijos. Carlos agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
Carlos is 27 years old. He is in a relationship with a woman and they have three children. Their oldest is 6 and the youngest is 1 year and 7 months. Carlos and his family live and have their business in the precinct San Bernabé in Los Bancos, a place with a warm climate. It is full of kind and hardworking people. Tourists from Ecuador and abroad always visit this canton to enjoy the flora and fauna. 

Carlos and his wife come from families with little resources, which prevented them from getting their education. They only finished elementary school and today they must work very hard so that their kids have what they were not able to. 

Carlos makes a living in agriculture. He raises pigs and works out in the fields. He learned this trade in his childhood from his parents because he was raised on a farm. Carlos works an average of 10 hours each day. While he is working, his wife helps him with his business. 

They are requesting this loan in order to expand their pig pens. With this new investment, they hope to improve their income and be able to provide their kids with a good future. Carlos thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the opportunities offered to him.

loans.use: to widen his pig pens.

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent is a 54-year-old Ugandan man. He is married to Rose and they have 10 children between the ages of 12 and 30. Five of their children attend school and Vicent is responsible for paying school fees and other necessities. Vicent has been selling clothing in Kagadi town since 1999.

He has approached Ugafode for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to complete his house. He hopes to pay back the loan using income from the sale of clothes. He is happy that he will be able to put his house in good shape and accommodate his dependents comfortably.

His dream for the future is to educate all his children and to improve his business. This will allow him to generate more income. However, he faces competition from the business people in the same field.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a toilet, pipe, cement, wire, rebar and cement blocks.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
La socia Maria Luisa se sigue dedicando al negocio confecciones como pantalones, faldas, vestidos, pantalones y blusas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 40 años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de costurera. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar telas, tijeras e hilos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Our member Maria Luisa's occupation continues to be sewing pieces of clothing such as pants, skirts, dresses and blouses. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. This has been her occupation for 40 years and her dream is to expand her business. She requests this loan to buy fabrics, scissors and thread. 

The member is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, scissors and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of oranges, mangoes, pawpaws, etc.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 37 years old. She is married, and together with her husband, has three children who are all currently in school. She is requesting a loan of 60,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) and has managed to pay all her previous loans successfully. 

She currently makes an estimated income per month of 30,000 KES. She will use this loan to purchase stock of home products in bulk. Susan anticipates that from the profits, she will be able to expand her business and educate her children to higher levels.

loans.use: to purchase more goods like basins and spoons

loans.name: Bashorathon

texts.ru: Башоратхон 61 год, вдова, мать 2 детей, дети взрослые и самостоятельные, дочь живет отдельно, а сын на заработках в России. У Башоратхон  - высшее образование, она окончила педагогический институт, долгие годы работала в местной школе, параллельно с 1998 года занимается полеводством и животноводством. Стартовав с 10,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день у Башоратхон  имеется 0,35 ГА собственного и 0,50 ГА арендованного земельного надела, на котором она ежегодно выращивает картошку и кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Башоратхон обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)для закупа высококачественных семян огурцов и томатов, часть средств будет потрачена на покупку бычков. Башоратхон намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Башоратхон хочет вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на постройку теплицы.
texts.en: Bashorathon is 61 years old, widowed, and the mother of 2 children.  Her children are grown and independent - her daughter lives by herself and her son lives in Russia for work.  Bashorathon has a higher education; she finished teaching school and worked for many years in the local school.  Beginning in 1998 with 10,000 KGS, she also started working in farming and animal husbandry.  Thanks to hard work, Bashorathon now has 0.35 hectares of her own land and 0.50 hectares of rented land on which she raises potatoes and corn to eat and to sell.  Her monthly income is 20,000 KGS.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Bashorathon turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase high quality cucumber and tomato seeds, and also to buy steers.  Bashorathon will have a good harvest, which will certainly improve her family's capital.  With the income from her loan, Bashorathon hopes to invest in increasing the size of her herd, and plans to save towards building a greenhouse.

loans.use: To buy cucumber and tomato seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her business.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.ru: Эту сельскую женщину зовут Зайнаб. Она начинает свою деятельность по купле и продаже скотов. Зайнаб интересуется мелкорогатыми скотами. Она имеет все условия для начала и ведения этой деятельности в своем районе Кубадиён. Вблизи ее дома расположено несколько пастбищ, а также она еще и запаслась сухим кормом скота. Однако для купли скота ее начального капитала совсем не хватает. Она нуждается в заемных средствах и поэтому обратилась за кредитом. Зайнаб на сумму кредита планирует приобрести 15 голов мелкорогатого скота, чтобы начать новую деятельность и обеспечить семью новым источником дохода. Этот кредит очень важен для их семьи, так как поможет повысить их благосостояние.
texts.en: This rural woman's name is Zainab.  She is starting her own business buying and selling cattle.  Zainab is interested in horned cattle.  She has all of the necessities to start and run this business in her region of Qubadiyon.  Near her home are several pastures, and she has also stocked up on dry cattle feed.  She does not, however, have sufficient capital to buy cattle.  She needs to borrow money, and for that reason is asking for a loan.  With money from the loan, Zainab plans to buy 15 head of horned cattle to start a new business and provide a new source of income for her family.  This loan is very important for her family, because it will help them improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase 15 head of cattle to start a new business and provide a source of income for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her business.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
This is 31-year-old Angelina. She is a happily married mother of two children, ages 4 and 1. She is very grateful for the support she has received from Kiva over the last year in growing her money transfer business. 

Last year, Angelina accessed a Kiva loan that allowed her to increase her working capital. This enabled her to serve more customers from her shop. 

Angelina is very happy with her business. She has managed to expand the business by opening two more Zoona mobile money transfer outlets throughout the country. She has also employed two more people to work at her shops. 

Angelina, a nurse by profession, enjoys her business because she is able to offer financial services to the community and employ young people who are straight from high school. She says most of the people she employs are trying to raise money for their college tuition, and jobs for youth in her community are very difficlut to find. 

Angelina is requesting a second Kiva loan to purchase a trading booth for a third mobile money outlet that she wants to open. This loan will also be used as working capital to serve customers at her new shop. Running her business empowers Angelina to provide for her family and pay for their housing.

loans.use: To purchase a trading booth for a third mobile money outlet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business.

loans.name: Medelkan

texts.ru: Меделкан 57 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей. Все дети взрослые и живут отдельно. У Меделкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1990 году с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Меделкан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 6 дойных коров и 2 телят. Дополнительно Меделкан реализует молоко. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Меделкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для закупки коров. Меделкан намерена увеличить поголовье скота, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Меделкан планирует вложить в расширение сараев для содержания скота.
texts.en: Medelkan is 57 years old, widowed, and the mother of 2 children, who are grown and live by themselves.  Medelkan has a secondary education.  Medelkan's work in animal husbandry, beginning in 1990 with 5,000 KGS, serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Thanks to the purposefulness and hard work of Medelkan, she now has 6 milk cows and 2 calves, from which she obtains milk to sell.  Her monthly income is about 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of expanding her business, Medelkan turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 80,000 KGS to purchase cows.  Medelkan intends to increase the number of cattle in her herd, which will certainly increase her family's capital.  With the income from the loan Medelkan plans to save towards enlarging the stables in which she keeps her cattle.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Fraser

texts.en:
This is 28-year-old Fraser. He is engaged to marry his long time fiancé Adelina who helps with the day-to-day running of the business. His business deals in the sending and receiving of money from one place to the other. 
 
Fraser started running his mobile money transfer business because he saw a need for people to access affordable financial services. He explains that before he set up his shop, people in his community would have to spend money on transportation to access financial services. He was also motivated by the need to provide a better life for him and his fiancé. He says the business is not yet profitable but he is hopeful that with the financial help from Kiva, he can pay for his trading booth and add to the money that he uses to service his customers.

Fraser has requested a Kiva loan to pay for his trading booth and boost his working capital. This will help his business become profitable, as he will be able to service more customers in his community who need financial services.    

Fraser’s dream is to open more mobile money transfer outlets throughout the country. He thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a trading booth and increase the cash that he uses to serve his customers

loans.name: Partison

texts.en:
Partison is a 49-year-old man from Kakamega County, which is located in the western part of Kenya. He supports six people in the family and is married to Mrs. Rhoda who is a business lady.

Partison sells scrap metal, a business he has been operating for the last 18 years and makes a monthly income of KES 8,000. He is taking his first loan with VisionFund Kenya, which he will use to purchase more metal for recycling. He will use the anticipated profit to boost his business.

His dream is to open another business and support his family.

loans.use: to purchase more metals to recycle

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 64 years old from Nyahururu. He is married to Mary and they are blessed with four children who are 26, 24, 21 and 18 years old.

He is a farmer, a business he has been running for the last 20 years. To enable him to buy some pesticides, fertilizer and vegetable seedlings for planting, he has applied for his fourth loan of KES  60,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

His monthly income right now is KES 20,000 and his plan is to use the anticipated profits from his expanded business to pay his loan back to VisionFund Kenya and to buy some poultry.

In the future, Joseph hopes to be a successful farmer.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, fertilizer and some vegetable seedlings

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a man of 50 years, married to Angela and a father of two children.  He runs a butcher shop in Kiambu and practices dairy farming. He has been in this business for 10 years and gets a monthly income of 54,000 KES.

This will be Samuel's first loan with VisionFund Kenya. He plans to use the entire loan to buy meat in bulk for his business. In the future, he wants to be a successful businessman.

loans.use: to purchase meat in bulk to sell

loans.name: Muhtabar

texts.ru: Мухтабар 62 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Мухтабар - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав в 1974 году, благодаря упорному труду Мухтабар, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 5 лошадей и 20 овец, а также есть земельный надел мерою 1,20 ГА, на котором ежегодно Мухтабар выращивает фасоль и клевер для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мухтабар обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота, также она хочет приобрести семена и селитру. Доходы от кредита Мухтабар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и хочет накопить средства на увеличение площади сарая.
texts.en: Muhtabar is 62 years old, married, and, with her husband, is raising 5 children.  Muhtabar has a secondary education.  Muhtabar's word in animal husbandry and farming, beginning in 1974, serves as the family's primary source of income.  Thanks to Muhtabar's hard work, she now has 1 milk cow, 5 horses, and 20 sheep.  She also has a 1.20 hectare plot of land, on which Muhtabar raises beans and clover for eating and for sale.  Her monthly income is 12,000 KGS.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Muhtabar turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase cows to increase the size of her herd.  She also wants to buy seeds and nitrates.  With the income she earns from the loan Muhtabar plans to save towards further increasing the size of her herd and hopes to save toward enlarging her barn.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Roda

texts.en:
HELLO WORLD! Meet Roda, 69, a hardworking entrepreneur running a mixed farming business on her five-acre piece of land in the North Rift Valley region of Eldoret, home to some of the world's finest marathon runners. After her husband passed on, she really values visits from her independent daughter who is the apple of Roda's eye.

Roda enjoys the beauty and health of her environmental surroundings as much as she does about raising dairy cows. She is constantly planting trees and cultivates a wide variety of flowers. When you visit her farm, you will notice various works of art within and around her home.

This will be Roda's fourth loan from Juhudi! She has always repaid on time. Roda gets by selling the milk her cattle produce. She is deeply passionate about dairy farming, and is so appreciative of the microfinance that helped her first empower herself to become an entrepreneur that she named her cows Juhudi and Juhudi Kilimo. Recently, however, one of the cows accidentally stepped into a pit and injured her leg while being led to pasture. Roda is devastated but remains optimistic and is hopeful that Juhudi will walk again soon.

Today, Roda is now in need of two additional cows to maximize use of her pasture. In the past, she has successfully serviced Juhudi Kilimo loans on time and is now requesting a new loan.

With your loan, Roda will sustain and improve her agricultural business activities. With the increased income, she dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy two high production dairy cows

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de rocoto relleno,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como rocoto,carne,huevos y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Margot, continues to be in the business of selling stuffed hot peppers. She sells them on the streets. She has several years in this business.

The dream of this woman is to have a restaurant. The requested loan is to buy products for cooking as hot peppers, meat, eggs and vegetables.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of their share.

loans.use: to buy products for cooking such as peppers, meat, eggs and vegetables.

loans.name: Zarrinakhon

texts.ru: Зарринахон жизнерадостная женщина. Ей 33 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 5 лет назад она начала свой бизнес с куплей продажей женской одежды. Она продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. Она старается выбрать товар, который имеет большой спрос. Для того, чтобы привлечь больше клиентов, она должна обновлять товар каждый сезон. Она должна купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони  для покупки товара для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zarrinakhon is a cheerful woman of 33.  She is married and is raising 3 children.  5 years ago, with the goal of meeting her family's needs, she started her own business buying and selling women's clothing.  She sells her wares in the local market and has a large circle of clients.  She tries to choose wares that will make a large profit and, in order to attract more clients, needs to update her merchandise every season.  She needs to purchase clothing for the new season, but she doesn't have sufficient funds.  She is asking for 5000 TJS to buy wares for the new season, and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy women's clothing for the new season

loans.name: Norga Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,ella tiene un restaurant,la socia prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues in the business of selling food.  She has a restaurant, and prepares breakfast, lunch and dinner.  She prepares a variety of dishes like baked chicken, soups and sautéed meat.

She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.  She has been in this business for eight years and is doing very well.  The dream of this woman is to have a restaurant. The member requesting a loan to buy cooking products such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of their share.

loans.use: to buy cooking products such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Zhypariza

texts.ru: Жыпариза, 43 года, вдова, мать 3 детей. У Жыпаризы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 2000 году с 15,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию, Жыпариза на сегодняшний день имеет: 1 дойную корову, 1 лошадь и 18 овец. Также есть 1,14 ГА земельной доли, на которой она ежегодно выращивает фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жыпариза обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) для закупки удобрений и ГСМ. Жыпариза намерена увеличить поголовье скота и получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья скота, улучшения урожайности и качества почвы.
texts.en: Zhypariza is 43 years old, widowed, and the mother of 3 children.  Zhypariza has a secondary education.  Her work in farming and animal husbandry, beginning in 2000 with 15,000 KGS, serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Thanks to purposefulness and hard work, Zhypariza now has 1 milk cow, 1 horse, and 18 sheep, as well as a 1.14 hectare plot of land on which she raises beans for eating and for sale.  Her combined monthly income is about 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Zhypariza turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 30,000 KGS to buy fertilizer and fuel.  Zhypariza intends to increase the size of her herd and to have a good harvest, which will certainly increase her family's capital.  With the income from the loan, she plans to save toward further expanding her herd, and also to improve the quality and productivity of her soil.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ilse Maria

texts.es: Ilse de 36 años de edad habita en un municipio cercano a la ciudad de Barranquilla, allí se dedica a la venta de productos congelados elaborados en harina de trigo, como deditos de queso, empanandas etc. Su experiencia data desde el año 2006, cuando una buena amiga la enseñó y empezó con poco capital, logrando gradualmente hacer crecer su negocio. Todos los dias Ilse prepara la masa, realiza los cortes agregando diversos rellenos que deleitan a su clientela y posteriormente realiza el proceso de empaque en recipientes de icopor. Sus ventas las realiza directa,mente a empleados y en empresas cercanas . Ilse tiene como meta abrir un punto comercial donde exhibir y vender todo los alimentos que ella sabe preprara , con el fin de ganar mas dinero y lograr su meta familiar mas soñada, que es la de brindar una educación de calidad a su hija. En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace ala Fundación mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará harina de trigo, grasas, dulces, queso, dulce de guayaba  y articulos de empaque en un mayor volumen. Con esta inversión su negocio mejorará porque ocupará la capacidad ociosa del enfriador en el que puede almacenar debidamente los productos alimentarios que fabrica, teniendo así inventarios con los cuales dará una respuesta oportuna al cliente.
texts.en:
Ilse is 36 years old and lives in a town near Barranquilla, where she sells frozen products made from flour, such as ladyfingers, empanadas, etc.  She has been doing this since 2006, when a good friend of her’s taught her.  She started with little capital, eventually growing her business.  She prepares the dough every day, stuffs the empanadas them with different fillings, and then packages them up.  She makes her sales directly to employees at the nearby companies.  Ilse’s goal is to open a local shop where she can show and sell all the products that she knows how to make, so she can earn more money and be able to provide a quality education for her daughter.

She is asking for a Kiva loan and this will be her first loan through Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy flour, lard, sweets, cheese, candied guava, and packaging materials in quantity.  This investment will improve your business because she will be able to use her cooler’s extra capacity in the cooler to properly store more food products and provide timely customer response.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothes such as blouses, t-shirts, trousers, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, bread, oil, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers, lappa (fabric), jeans, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru:
Салима доброжелательная и отзывчивая женщина, которая сейчас планирует начать свой бизнес. Ее интересует купля и продажа миндального ореха. Салима планирует оптом покупать миндаль у дехкан и затем по прибыльной цене продавать на местном рынке своего района Кубадиён. Семья всецело поддерживает ее с этим решением.
Салиме 57 лет. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Она хочет начать бизнес, чтобы улучшить финансовое положение семьи. Однако для того, чтобы начать бизнес она нуждается в кредите. Салима очень надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Salima is a friendly and responsive women, and is planning on starting her own business buying and selling almonds.  Salima plans to buy wholesale from farmers and then sell them at a profit at the local market of her region, Qubadiyon.  Her family fully supports her decision.  Salima is 57 years old, married, and has four children.  She wants to start her business in order to improve her family's financial situation.  However, in order to start her business she needs credit.  Salima is hoping for your financial support.

loans.use: to purchase and sell almonds

loans.name: Evas

texts.en:
Evas is a fifty-year-old hardworking widow living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She deals in poultry as her main source of income though she has other side businesses like farming, where she earns an extra income. She started this business to sustain herself and have a better standard of living. She faces a challenge of chicken diseases that affect her birds and sometimes they end up dying. She has a vision of owning a big modern poultry farm.

She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens to sell.

loans.use: to buy more chickens to sell.
